cab.content: REPORT OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF EDUCATION.The Estimates of the Board of Education for the current Financial Year, including the Supplementary Estimate for additional Grants to Local Education Authorities, were yesterday introduced in the House of Commons.A Memorandum explaining the Supplementary Estimate, together with a copy of the Regulations under which Supplementary Grant will, subject to the consent of parliament, be paid to the Local Education Authorities, and a copy of the Boards revised Regulations for Secondary Schools in England and Wales have also been presented to parliament.Apart from routine work and a number of inquiries connected with proposed Legislation, the staff of the Department have been engaged on a draft ill which has been prepared with a view to carrying into effect the proposals sanctioned by the War Cabinet and outlined in my Speech in the House of Commons.J-/. a. 4. A.-20th April 1917.
